comment.author: 8822983@N08
comment._content: This is an interesting two wheeled cart that would have been more manoeuvrable than the four wheeled type but needed to be finely balanced to avoid placing undue stress on the bullocks nearest the cart, known as polers, because they were attached to the projecting pole.  Too much weight would break their neck by pressing down on the yoke, too little would lift them off the ground and strangle them.

comment._content: Merryjack - do I detect a tail skid at the rear of the wagon?
